00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: wn_title.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:14 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 ***************************************************************************/
00004 
00005 /*---------------------------------------
00006   WN_TITLE.C
00007 ---------------------------------------*/
00008 
00009 #include <stdarg.h>
00010 #include <string.h>
00011 #include "window.h"
00012 
00013 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00014    FUNCTION: wn_title()
00015     PURPOSE: Draw title in topline of the window
00016      SYNTAX: int wn_title(WINDOW *w, char *format, ...)
00017 DESCRIPTION: The window has to have a border.
00018              The window used will become the active window.
00019     RETURNS: TRUE  if all is well,
00020              FALSE if title is too big to fit on window
00021              NO_WINDOW if no window opened.
00022     HISTORY: 910907 V0.1
00023 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00024 int wn_title(WINDOWPTR w, char *format, ...)
00025 {
00026   va_list arguments;
00027   char title[80];    /* Title string     */
00028 
00029 
00030   /*---------------------------------------------------
00031     Check if window opened and if it is the top window
00032   ----------------------------------------------------*/
00033   if (!w)
00034     return(NO_WINDOW);
00035   if (w != top_window)
00036     wn_top(w);
00037 
00038   /*------------------------------
00039     Check if window has a border
00040   -------------------------------*/
00041   if (w->btype == _NO_BORDER)
00042     return(NO_WINDOW);
00043 
00044   /*--------------------
00045     va_... housekeeping
00046   ----------------------*/
00047   va_start(arguments,format);
00048 
00049   /*-------------
00050     Build string
00051   ---------------*/
00052   vsprintf(title,format,arguments);
00053 
00054   /*---------------------
00055     va_... house-keeping
00056   -----------------------*/
00057   va_end(arguments);
00058 
00059   /*----------------------------------------------------------
00060     Store the title. If already space allocated for titel in
00061     the window structure, free this first
00062   ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00063   if (w->title)
00064     free(w->title);
00065   w->title = strdup(title);
00066 
00067   /*-----------------
00068     Print the title
00069   ------------------*/
00070   wn_log("wn_title(%p,%s)\n",w,title);
00071   wn_border(w,w->btype);
00072   if (strlen(title) < (w->xsize-2))
00073   {
00074     printcenter(w->y1 - 1, w->x1 + (w->xsize >> 1), title);
00075     return(TRUE);
00076   }
00077   else
00078     return(FALSE);
00079 }
